sentences: Meie eestlased on alati head inimesed - me rääkisite hea ja selgelt.
context: The word 'rääkisite' is the past tense, plural form of the Estonian verb 'rääkima', which means 'to speak' or 'to talk'. The '-site' ending indicates that this is addressing multiple people in the past tense. It would typically be used when speaking to a group of people who have already spoken or engaged in conversation.
